page.title: 20The Future
page.content: It is difficult to predict what may happen in the future but there have been some recent developments which may help to indicate possible future trends. Employment within the immediate area is limited; many of our young people will have to move away to find work, or at least be prepared to commute. For those who do stay the problem is one of being able to afford property in the area. House prices are high and this has led to fewer young families residing in the area. Consequently school numbers have fallen among the younger age groups. If this trend continues the age structure of the area will become increasingly elderly. The local secondary school has resisted pressures to close due to its small size. If numbers continue to fall the closure of the school may occur.
